extendedInfo.description: An awesome new variant to one of the highest rated dice puzzle games ever made!  Youâve played Lock N Roll, now try to up your game for the DELUXE version.  Lock 'n' Roll Deluxe is the newest free puzzle game from the makers of the ULTIMATE free puzzle game combining the strategy of Tetris with the luck of Yahtzee.  With new features such as bonus coins and new wild cards, youâll come up with an all new way to challenge the puzzle of the mind.    âThis game is one of the best I have played. It seems simple at first but it soon becomes apparent that, if you want to get far, you need to pay close attention. Itâs a shining example of famous games like chess and risk which are easy to learn, but can take a lifetime to master. If you have room on your phone, or even if you don't, get it.â â A Google UserIf youâre still not downloading the puzzle game of the year, hereâs some quick insight as to how to play the coolest free puzzle dice game for Android:Roll four dice at a time and arrange them on a 4x4 grid. Receive points for various combinations according to number and color.You must place all four dice and once you lock them down, they are fixed in place! The most difficult combinations are cleared from the board.Prove your smarts in this fun puzzle dice game. Challenge scores shared by pro players and see how you do with the same dice!

reviews.title: New look sucks
reviews.comment: I love the game. Totally addicted but the new look makes it confusing and not as appealing
reviews.author: Morghan Mahlke

reviews.title: Lnr
reviews.comment: Love this dice game... So many ways to score and no levels to unlock... Just roll dice and score
reviews.author: Michelle Hahn

reviews.title: Lags
reviews.comment: It Lags! Can\'t even play it!
reviews.author: Lim Ze An

reviews.title: Best game ever!!!
reviews.comment: Totally addicted to it!!!! best game on market!!!! But new update makes it slowwwww & choppy :\'( Plzzzzzz fixxxxx! & the new graphics are fugly!!!!! :( update ruined game :\'( :\'( very choppy & slow plzzzzzzzzzzzzz fix!!!! I LUVVVV this game but its all fugged up :\'(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please change the look of the dice back to normal!!!!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing this game for years now. And the updated dice are lame please change it back. The new look of the dice make this game look like a cheap game. Please please please change the look back please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Brian Stiefel

reviews.comment: Wtf??!!!!! Everytime my  score  is  200k or more, it forecloses!! No more updates pleeeeaaase! You \'re just ruining the whole game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What the hell was that update?!
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this game for years, first on the app store then I got it on android. It was perfectly fine and I\'ve never gotten tired of it but the latest update has made it unbearable to play. The layout looks ghastly on my tablet, and I really can\'t stand it so I\'m uninstalling the app.  Sort it out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game been playing since it came out. But what did u just do to the graphics in this update? It\'s like someone vomited on the nice graphics then gave it back to me and said play. Please change it back to the old ones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I like playing dice did have farkle which I enjoyed but have come across this one I know will be a lot of fun happy to have grabbed the deluxe for free I recommend thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great all around
reviews.comment: This game is one of the best I have played. It seems simple at first but it soon becomes apparent that, if you want to get far, you need to pay close attention. Its a shining example of fameous games like chess and risk which are easy to learn, but can take a lifetime to master. If you have room on your phone, or even if you don\'t, get it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: My favorite mind boggling game. I recommend this game to all who want to keep their minds busy. Good job to the people who made this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constantly crashes
reviews.comment: Do not download this app for the LG Thrill.  It crashes after 45 seconds of play every time I open it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Such a Fun Game!
reviews.comment: I\'m still not 100% on all the combos, but I love the game anyway!
reviews.author: A Google User
